item.description:
Scoreboard welcomes back the Fools, Saturday, January 28th. Last time around the Fool rocked the house performing some of their greatest hits like “Work Sucks then you Die” and “Psycho Chicken.” The performance of the Fools is like no other, this is a performance you will not want to miss, and will keep you laughing the whole night through.

 

To purchase your tickets call today 781-249-0733.

 

 Tickets are $12 advance / $15 door

 

 

I'll send my cell # out a few days before the event so we can find each other.  I am also now the proud owner of my very own MEETUP pin so will be wearing that as well.
item.how_to_find_us: Couple of us get there early to grab tables, then I'll mosey back up to lobby to meet people
item.name: Dancing like fools to The Fools!
